mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCTID, PRODUCTNAME, PRODUCTIMG, PRODUCTPRICE, PRODUCTSELLPRICE FROM PRODUCT
SELECT PRODUCTID, PRODUCTNAME, PRODUCTTYPE as type, PRODUCTIMG, PRODUCTPRICE, PRODUCTSELLPRICE FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCTID = #{productId}
SELECT PRODUCTID, PRODUCTNAME, PRODUCTTYPE, PRODUCTIMG, PRODUCTPRICE, PRODUCTSELLPRICE FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCTTYPE = #{productType}
SELECT PRODUCTID, PRODUCTNAME, PRODUCTIMG, PRODUCTPRICE, PRODUCTSELLPRICE FROM PRODUCT WHERE lower(PRODUCTNAME) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{keyword}) || '%'
